name: Check if the restful booker api can be updated by users by searching booking Id

testSteps.description: When I send a PUT request to bookingId endpoint with updated information firstname "Abbie" lastname "Crook" totalprice "999" depositpaid "Yes" booking dates additionalneeds "Dinner"

children.description: Updating user information with firstname: Abbie, lastname: Crook, totalprice: 999, depositpaid: false, bookingdates: {checkin=2022-12-01, checkout=2022-12-15}, additionalneeds: Dinner, bookingId: 4161
